item.title: How do i change starters?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Try searching code[/code]

Should look a lot like this.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {
     if (starter == 0) {
	sendMessage("Here is your starter, have a good time on the server.");
	addItem(995, 100000);
	starter = 1;
} else {	
        sendMessage("Sorry, you recieved your starter when you first logged in.");
		}
	}

This is where it specifies what it gives you:

addItem(995, 100000);

That is for 100000gp.

Say you wanted to have a whip in there aswell.
For example, you could then have:

addItem(995, 100000);
addItem(4151, 1);

Just add another line underneath for each item you want.

Now for the character items on login, go to your player.java, and search:

playerEquipment[playerHat] =

Below that, it should look like:

        playerEquipment[playerHat] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerChest] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerLegs] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerHands] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerFeet] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerRing] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerArrows] = -1;
        playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;

Simply change the -1 on the end to the item id you want the character to have equipped.

For example, the standard player wielding a whip would have this by the playerWeapon bit.

        playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 4151;

Simple as that, good luck.

Read full topic
